title: Kerning Help
content:
It looks a little off to me. Can anyone help? Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ROOM.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150423162607/http:/typophile.com/files/ROOM.jpg) | 15.58 KB |
author: markduk

comments.content: Size matters. Is this how large your finished art will be? If so, just tighten the 'RO' and loosen the 'OO' a bit.
Thanks Stephen - I'll give it a go. Cheers!
